lead_paragraph: Lleyton Hewitt called it quits on a 20-year career during the Australian Open in January. On Thursday, he was placed on standby as playing captain for Australia against the United States in the first round of World Group play at the Davis Cup.

headline.print_headline: So Much for Retirement: Hewitt on Standby as Playing Captain
headline.main: So Much for Retirement: Hewitt on Standby as Playing Captain
